ffmpeg
------

Description: 
   A complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and stream audio and video.

   The ADF-GUI uses ffmpeg (by invoking the external binary) to save movies. 

   The ffmpeg.exe binary is located in the $AMSBIN folder, you can use other version by setting the SCM_FFMPEG environment variable.
   The binaries included are taken from the ffmpeg web site, version 4.2.1 (Nov 2019)  without modification.

Website: 
   `http://www.ffmpeg.org/ <http://www.ffmpeg.org/>`__
